resources.string: The weak dont get to decide anything, not even how they die
people dont fear god, fear itself is god
When a man learns to love, he must bear the risk of hatred.
If you dont share someones pain, you can never understand them.
If you dont like your destiny, dont accept it. Instead have the courage to change it the way you want it to be.
If you dont take risk, you cant create a future.
Knowing what it feels like to be in pain, is exactly why we try to be kind to others.
No one is born in this world to be alone.
Dont try to find a reason for somebodys love.
